He also wasted no time in decrying the free phone program for migrants as “one of the dumbest things I’ve ever heard.” The smartphones provided by the Biden administration are reportedly used to track the migrants after they are released into the United States.

Noting that the flow of illegal immigration is an issue that has spanned multiple presidencies, Judd then explained that Biden’s policies are partly to blame for encouraging those looking to come over, as well as groups looking to take advantage of an easy payday.

“Without question the people who were coming across by the hundreds, and during the day by the thousands, have all paid $5,000 to $8,000, and if they came from a different country outside of South America: $30,000.

While traveling with some members of the House Oversight Committee earlier in the week, Fox News Digital reported that they saw fearless migrants snapping selfies as Border Patrol agents look on helplessly.
Brandon Judd, president of the National Border Patrol Council, grimly predicted the selfies will be used as advertisements for cartels and coyotes, who are paid to smuggle people across the border.

Rep. Paul Gosar, R -Arizona, accused the administration of allowing the unmanageable flood of humanity across the border as part of the “plan.”
“This is intentional.

“These are people with abilities, these are people with money, and they’re coming to overwhelm our great nation.”
